Both movies offer unique perspectives on love amidst adversity. Enjoy!

This classic drama features Elizabeth Taylor and Paul Newman in an intense family drama set during a Mississippi plantation reunion. The film is known for its deep character development and powerful performances.

Another film that might appeal to you is "As Good as It Gets". With an all-star cast led by Jack Nicholson, Greg Kinnear, and Helen Hunt, this movie combines romance with comedy while exploring themes of loneliness and connection. Enjoy the witty dialogue and heartwarming storyline!

If you're looking for something different, "Alex in Wonderland" might interest you. It features appearances by Jeanne Moreau and Paul Mazursky, and offers an intriguing look at the intersection of art and commercial success.
